httpcode
=======

```{r echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  warning = FALSE, 
  message = FALSE,
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

`httpcode` is a tiny R package to search for and show http code messages and description. It's a port of the Python `httpcode` library.

## Quick start

### Install

```{r eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("sckott/httpcode")
```

```{r}
library("httpcode")
```

## Search by http code

```{r}
http_code(100)
```

```{r}
http_code(400)
```

```{r}
http_code(503)
```

```{r}
http_code(999)
```

# Fuzzy code search

```{r}
http_code('1xx')
```

```{r}
http_code('3xx')
```

```{r}
http_code('30[12]')
```

```{r}
http_code('30[34]')
```

# Search by text message

```{r}
http_search("request")
```

```{r}
http_search("forbidden")
```

```{r}
http_search("too")
```

```{r}
http_search("birds")
```
